topic.title: Now Available: Fifteen Foreign Relations Volumes
topic.body: These volumes are newly digitized as part of the Office's ongoing project, in partnership with the University of Wisconsin Digital Collections Center, to digitize the entire Foreign Relations series. They cover events that took place between 1874 and 1887 and were originally published in print between 1875 and 1889.
topic.image-description: Word cloud generated from 15 Foreign Relations volumes
topic.image-source-information: Created by the Office of the Historian
